sql.name: mixedcircuitindicatorsinputreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: mixedcircuitindicatorsinputreport.group
mixedcircuitindicatorsinputreport.left
sql.item: select ' ',trim('混合电路合计-2M(条)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-2Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -2M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路合计-155M(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-155Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -155M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路合计-2.5G(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-2.5Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -2.5G *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路合计-10G(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-省际电路*-10Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -10G *(条)') from dual

sql.name: mixedcircuitindicatorsinputreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('混合电路合计-2M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000004),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-2Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -2M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000006),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路合计-155M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000010),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-155Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -155M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000012),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路合计-2.5G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000014),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-省际电路 *-2.5Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000015),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -2.5G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000016),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路合计-10G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000020),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-省际电路*-10Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('混合电路-城域网内电路 -10G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000022),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
